channel.title: Corrupted-souls
channel.description:
CORRUPTED-SOULS
[url=http://www.corrupted-souls.com]www.corrupted-souls.com[/url]
Admins - vicky - Childofkorn - behind_you
This is a the original "ZENITH-SCAPE" source/client i have added a lot of features that weren't in the source, still working on changing the client but a lot of my work is going into the source before the client is done. - High-scores side bar. - Experience calculator. - Auto donation side bar. - multiple colored schemes. - Just a few things I'm going to add to the client!
Eco-Based server / Vps hosted / Website / Active Community! Soon to buy an Advert sponsorship on Moparscape.
Over 30 players in-game and 50 on forums, constantly have players online and more join everyday.
Edit** Webdeveloper is no longer working with us as he never has time to do anything for us anymore and is doing his own thing.
Complete. Undergoing Construction. Not Started.
Skills. All skills are complete, few still contain minor bugs. -Attack -Strength -Defense -Range -Prayer -Mage -Rune-crafting -Construction -Dungeoneering -Constitution -Agility -Herb-lore -Thieving -Crafting -Fletch -Slayer -Hunter -Mining -Smithing -Fishing -Cooking -Fire-making -Woodcutting -Farming -Summoning
All loyalty features like. -Auras -Titles -Emotes -clothes Are all completely added, just designing a shop for them, and will be creating it through MySQL for the points.
Perfect Pking/Switching/Pvming
Hunting will soon be made all over Corrupted-souls butterfly's/implings/birds will all be randomly generated/moving around the place.
Mini-games. -Barrows -Castle wars -Dominion tower -Barrows -Souls wars -Duel arena
Bosses. -Gwd -Kbd -Qbd -Corp -Td -Jad -Nomad -Nex -Chaos elly
Most drops have been fixed, a lot of shops are to be introduced soon, a new home,
I'm also in the middle of finishing of a 100k below and above trade limit, this will hopefully keep the Eco steady and stop scamming, also to stop people Xferring from muted accounts/badly known accounts.
G.E buying system is working great, working on the selling part so it can be sold 15% below and higher then its set price which will then become apart of buying 15% lower or higher, pretty much like runescape but the prices wont change as often and the price will not be any higher/lower then that 15% range. [color=purple] Due to there being over 16k items its taking me a very long time to change all the item prices to what i would like them to be for Eco in Trade, and GE.
Credits.
*Zenithscape* TheWebGuy Myself Pirre Victoria And myself Daniel
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/kyubt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15psayb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/20jn31w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lnz286.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/35831vn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34g555v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qkt3cy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/358dk0j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dzja4y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/51eul1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yx28g4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fntfnl.png[/img] [URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/3896/120914182025.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/1755/120914182512.png[/img][/URL]
Temporary Grand Exchange sell, until we fully code normal sell :):)
[URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/773/120914182805.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Corrupted-souls
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

CORRUPTED-SOULS

www.corrupted-souls.com

Admins

  • vicky
  • Childofkorn
  • behind_you

This is a the original “ZENITH-SCAPE” source/client i have added a lot of features that weren’t in the source, still working on changing the client but a lot of my work is going into the source before the client is done.

  • High-scores side bar.
  • Experience calculator.
  • Auto donation side bar.
  • multiple colored schemes.
  • Just a few things I’m going to add to the client!

Eco-Based server / Vps hosted / Website / Active Community! Soon to buy an Advert sponsorship on Moparscape.

Over 30 players in-game and 50 on forums, constantly have players online and more join everyday.

Edit**
Webdeveloper is no longer working with us as he never has time to do anything for us anymore and is doing his own thing.

Complete.
Undergoing Construction.
Not Started.

Skills.
All skills are complete, few still contain minor bugs.
-Attack
-Strength
-Defense
-Range
-Prayer
-Mage
-Rune-crafting
-Construction
-Dungeoneering
-Constitution
-Agility
-Herb-lore
-Thieving
-Crafting
-Fletch
-Slayer
-Hunter
-Mining
-Smithing
-Fishing
-Cooking
-Fire-making
-Woodcutting
-Farming
-Summoning

All loyalty features like.
-Auras
-Titles
-Emotes
-clothes
Are all completely added, just designing a shop for them, and will be creating it through MySQL for the points.

Perfect Pking/Switching/Pvming

Hunting will soon be made all over Corrupted-souls butterfly’s/implings/birds will all be randomly generated/moving around the place.

Mini-games.
-Barrows
-Castle wars
-Dominion tower
-Barrows
-Souls wars
-Duel arena

Bosses.
-Gwd
-Kbd
-Qbd
-Corp
-Td
-Jad
-Nomad
-Nex
-Chaos elly

Most drops have been fixed, a lot of shops are to be introduced soon, a new home,

I’m also in the middle of finishing of a 100k below and above trade limit, this will hopefully keep the Eco steady and stop scamming, also to stop people Xferring from muted accounts/badly known accounts.

G.E buying system is working great, working on the selling part so it can be sold 15% below and higher then its set price which will then become apart of buying 15% lower or higher, pretty much like runescape but the prices wont change as often and the price will not be any higher/lower then that 15% range.
[color=purple]
Due to there being over 16k items its taking me a very long time to change all the item prices to what i would like them to be for Eco in Trade, and GE.

Credits.

Zenithscape
TheWebGuy
Myself
Pirre
Victoria
And myself Daniel
